list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a substance used to stimulate the production of antibodies and provide immunity against one or several diseases, prepared from the causative agent of a disease, its products, or a synthetic substitute, treated to act as an antigen without inducing the disease.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: there is no vaccine against the virus
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Không có vắc-xin chống lại virus
